column5: Ok, right at the checkout at Canadian Tire stores( I've been to two different location and seen it at both ), there's this big stand-up poster of a boy fishing from a boat with his father.  Well, the kid has an excited expression on his face as he shows a fish on the end of his line.  Well, take a close look at the fish.  It's already gutted and cleaned!!!  It really had me laughing!  The agency that created the poster probably thought no one would notice.
Please post a photo, that sounds hilarious!
In this day and age, this could be shrewed marketing.  Tons of people will want to see the poster.  CT hits the jackpot
I'll see if I can get one!
